name: Sew Me
description:
You were broken apart. But luckily, you found a needle and thread. Use them to find your missing parts and re-sew your body! Avoid other dangerous stuffed animals and use your needle to swing yourself through the house!

How to play:
You need to find your missing part in every level, then reach the door (at the right end).
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Left Mouse click <- Throw Needle to mouse
Right Mouse click <- Pull yourself to needle (Thread will act as "rope")
Left Mouse click (when needle is thrown) <- Return needle

Throw your needle at enemies to bind them!

Game made by:
Jannik Busse (Programmer / Level Design)
Marcus Atnox (Programmer / Level Design)
Wen Chen (Graphic Artist)
Lukas Seltmann (Programmer/ Level Design)
Maximilian Senge (Programmer)
Jannik Gröger (Programmer)

Music by:
Jake Parton
